mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ingredients (name, category_id, price, unit, stock, image) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{stock}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE ingredients SET name=#{name}, category_id=#{categoryId}, price=#{price}, unit=#{unit}, stock=#{stock}, image=#{image} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cuisines ORDER BY id

UPDATE recipes SET is_recommended = #{isRecommended} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.title, COUNT(f.id) as favorite_count FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN favorites f ON r.id = f.recipe_id GROUP BY r.id ORDER BY favorite_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT o.*, u.username as userName FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
